Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Ilovebooks "Ilovebooks"
Reviews.Content: This is a great outdoor TV!  Had a football party outside - even with the sun shining on it, we could still see it! My friends were impressed.  Amazing to watch at night. I have it hooked up by cat5 cabling to my family room TV so I can access my DirectTV system including dvr without having an to pay for an extra receiver.

ProductInfo.Features:
46-Inch Flat Screen OUTDOOR All-Weather Resin Black Color Enclosure
Engineered for outdoor residential installations
High-resolution 1920 x 1080 pixel Full HD 1080p 46 Inch LCD
Contrast Ratio 4000:1 - Viewing Angle 176o x 176o
Speakers 20-watt Built-in Speakers
ProductInfo.Name: SunBriteTV SB-4660HDB 46-inch Outdoor LCD TV
